quest.name: Too Few Cooks
journal:
Dreamingway is practically vibrating with enthusiasm.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

Hopes bolstered by the success of the machining station, Dreamingway is eager to continue expanding the dreams on offer, and Managingway naturally has detailed thoughts on potential next steps. They suggest cooking as a dream unlikely to have occurred to many a Loporrit before─though due to this population-wide dearth of culinary expertise, the new station must needs be manned by Cookingway, or no one at all. With that in mind, you and Dreamingway set out for Old Sharlayan, where the Loporrit chef has been continuing his studies into Etheirys's cuisine of late.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

You join Dreamingway at your pre-arranged meeting spot in Old Sharlayan's aetheryte plaza before any knee-based harm comes to him. In the name of efficiency, you and your companion first resolve to determine where in the city Loporrits have recently been sighted ere you guess at Cookingway's whereabouts.

You speak with several Sharlayans, and it transpires that not one, but two Loporrits have been in the area recently. One is quickly identified due to overwhelming pudding-related evidence, but another was sighted heading for the Studium─possibly in search of recipes─and may be the Way you seek.

A search of Phenomenon confirms that the aforementioned Loporrit was indeed Cookingway. Though he was unaware of his fellows' plight until this very moment, he feels an immediate call to assist them, and readily agrees to operate a cooking station in Hoper's Hold. As the residents of Bestways Burrow typically plate whole carrots─if, indeed, the carrot gets that far─and gnaw upon them directly, however, place settings and utensils will be required.

At Cookingway's suggestion, you inquire with Dickon at the Last Stand about the accoutrements necessary for serving proper cuisine. He provides you with a robust list to deliver to Managingway, noting that he himself would love to partake of lunar fare should the opportunity arise.

Back in Hoper's Hold, you inquire with Dreamingway as to your part in setting up the cooking station. He duly conveys Managingway's instructions as to what you are to create, and sends you off with the necessary materials and a reminder that more can be had from the dreaming supporter.

Having created restaurant supplies of Loporrit proportions, you make your delivery to Dreamingway so that the cooking can begin. Soon, a wide array of dishes is laid out before you, attracting passersby with delicious aromas. With such bold flavor horizons now open to them, many a Way is sure to stumble upon new aspirations.
objectives: Speak with Dreamingway in Old Sharlayan and have him accompany you.
Speak with the people of Old Sharlayan while accompanied by Dreamingway.
Speak with Cookingway while accompanied by Dreamingway.
Speak with Dreamingway in Hoper's Hold.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: The machining station has surpassed our wildest imaginings! What are those things?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Mechanical mysteries aside, we've gathered a good crowd. Yet I know we can do more. I feel it in my ears!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I asked the others if they had any ideas, and apparently, Managingway has it all planned out.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Managingway, can you share your thoughts with Forename?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Certainly. Ahem! Consider, if you will, the traditional Loporrit diet─carrots, carrots, and more carrots. Many of us, myself included, have in fact subsided exclusively on carrots.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Contact with the people of Etheirys, however, has revealed a whole world of non-carrot foodstuffs, in addition to fascinating trades and traditions entirely centered around food.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: If a Loporrit's heart harbored a secret passion for such cuisine, how would they know? They would not─until they visited our one-of-a-kind cooking station, that is.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: A delicious idea, is it not? ...I'm genuinely asking─I too have eaten naught but carrots, you see.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: And thus we arrive at our primary issue─staffing. There are few Loporrits with sufficient knowledge of cuisine...

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: What about Puddingway? He's certainly...enthusiastic.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I know a cooking Way─Cookingway.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, no. Oh, no no no. Hoper's Hold would be stuffed to the brim with pudding before the day is out! The acoustics would be dreadful─and I doubt Inventingway's machines are pudding-proof.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Perhaps we should ask Cookingway after all. There truly is no better Loporrit for the job!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: He does seem to be the natural choice, doesn't he?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, he's currently studying with the Sharlayans. We would need to coax him back to the moon if he is to work with us.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Perhaps he won't need coaxing! We won't know until we try!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...Though I don't fancy wandering through the city by myself again, what with the gleaners running to and fro. They never watch where they're swinging those pointy knees of theirs. Please, would you come and protect me from the knees?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I am in your debt! Together we shall brave the fearsome aetheryte plaza...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: All those people... All those knees... But we must approach if we are to inquire as to Cookingway's whereabouts!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Not that the folk of Etheirys are terribly good at telling us Loporrits apart. Hmmm...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Perhaps we can begin by simply asking if they've seen any Loporrits about. Aside from me, that is. Shall we?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Dreamingway is now accompanying you. Keep him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can leave Dreamingway behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with him and selecting the option to part ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you wish to have Dreamingway join you again, return and speak with him at the original location.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Talk.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Part ways with Dreamingway.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I see why your tours of Etheirys come so highly recommended! My fear of becoming hopelessly lost or trampled has fallen at least fifty percent with you by my side.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Quick, to the Studium! Wherever that is!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Discuss the Rostra.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Gazing at it from the faraway moon, we always imagined Etheirys to be the most beautiful place...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: And truly, it is. I'm glad it's still here.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Discuss the Agora.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Seeing so many shops lined up, I can't help but feel excited─who knows what's in store?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: We wanted the other Loporrits to experience that same sense of anticipation, so Managingway and I used this place as a reference for the Dreaming Workshop. Can you tell?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: Are you sure you wish to part ways with Dreamingway?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, did you have a personal matter to take care of? All right! I'll go and stand very still in the aetheryte plaza until you get back.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Standing very still suited me far better than becoming hopelessly lost! Shall we continue our search now?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Standing very still suited me far better than becoming hopelessly lost! Shall we continue our search now?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must be accompanied by Dreamingway and have him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Dreamingway has yet to arrive. Be sure he is at your side before attempting to continue.

dialogue.name: CITIZENA04683
dialogue.text: Loporrits? I have seen a few in passing, though I have not yet had the pleasure of speaking with any.

dialogue.name: CITIZENA04683
dialogue.text: Loporrits? Yes, I do recall seeing a few of your kin earlier this eveningmorningafternoon.

dialogue.name: CITIZENA04683
dialogue.text: One appeared to be off to the Last Stand, while the other was walking toward the Studium.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Sharlayans truly are as knowledgeable as they say! Thank you, good sir!

dialogue.name: CITIZENB04683
dialogue.text: What adorable little creatures those Loporrits are. Is it acceptable to ruffle their fur, I wonder...

dialogue.name: CITIZENB04683
dialogue.text: I did see a Loporrit not long ago, in fact. They were watching diners at the Last Stand and muttering something about...

dialogue.name: CITIZENB04683
dialogue.text: ...Pudding? Yes, I could have sworn they were murmuring, “How's the pudding?” Most peculiar.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Hmmm... I have a sneaking suspicion that your mystery mutterer is not the Loporrit we're looking for, but I appreciate the information nevertheless!

dialogue.name: CITIZENC04683
dialogue.text: What a lovely breeze we're having!

dialogue.name: CITIZENC04683
dialogue.text: Oh, another Loporrit! This must be my lucky day!

dialogue.name: CITIZENC04683
dialogue.text: I was indeed just speaking with one of your kind about his research into Far Eastern recipes─a particular interest of mine. I must say, that fellow has good taste.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Recipes, you say? Why, that must have been Cookingway! Do you happen to know where he went?

dialogue.name: CITIZENC04683
dialogue.text: Not precisely, though he headed off toward the west side of town. Perhaps he went to research more recipes.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: In any case, your assistance in this matter has been greatly appreciated!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Based on what we've gleaned thus far, I believe the unidentified Loporrit headed for the Studium is most likely our Cookingway. In which case, we shall be right on his tail!

dialogue.name: CITIZENA04683
dialogue.text: I assume the fellow headed for the Last Stand was planning on a meal, and the one approaching the Studium was engaged in research of some kind. Though for all I know, it could be the opposite.

dialogue.name: CITIZENB04683
dialogue.text: ...Is there something in the pudding that I should be aware of?

dialogue.name: CITIZENC04683
dialogue.text: I do hope that little fellow finds the recipes he's searching for!

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Why, if it isn't Forename! You're well, I hope?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Salutations, Cookingway!

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Dreamingway, is that you?

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: What happened to your clothing? It's very...yellow.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Well, since you asked...

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Heavens! I had no idea that our fellow Loporrits were in such dire straits.

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: It's only right that I do what I can to help them.

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...And I must admit that I'm eager to test the many recipes I have learned here on Etheirys.

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: I know I've been a bit fixated upon carrots in the past, but I'm a changed Loporrit now. There's a whole world of flavor out there, and it's time that we brought it to Bestways Burrow!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Huzzah! Flavor!

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Of course, I will need a kitchen...

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: I can provide my own pots and pans, but I would appreciate your assistance with dishes and utensils. Most of Etheirys's cuisine is not so conducive to gnawing as one might expect.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Leave it to us! I saw a “chop stick” once!

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Yes, about that... It would probably be best for you to consult Master Dickon at the Last Stand about the details. He'll show you what you'll need to prepare, and in what quantities.

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Meanwhile, I shall return to the burrow and begin preparing my kitchen. There is much to be done!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Thank heavens he agreed!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Let's go and speak with this “Master Dickon.” I imagine that you have a rough idea of what utensils are, but it never hurts to get a second opinion.

dialogue.name: DICKON
dialogue.text: Well, if it isn't my favorite temporary server.

dialogue.name: DICKON
dialogue.text: ...And I see you've brought one of the cute little moon fellows, too.

dialogue.name: DICKON
dialogue.text: Tableware for the Loporrits? Well, why not?

dialogue.name: DICKON
dialogue.text: You'll need dishes and bowls, of course, some cutlery...perhaps tablecloths and mats as well. One moment─I'll make a list.

dialogue.name: DICKON
dialogue.text: This should be everything.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Thank you very much!

dialogue.name: DICKON
dialogue.text: Don't mention it─just save a place for me. I'll get up there one of these days...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Please do! I'll even send you a proper invitation once we're operational.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Speaking of which─it's time we returned to Hoper's Hold. Those sticks won't chop themselves!

dialogue.name: DICKON
dialogue.text: I hope your friend's as good as his word─I'd love to try lunar cuisine.

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Huh. I always thought this was a cupboard.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER
dialogue.text: Greetings! If you require direction, please speak with Dreamingway. <blip> Today's automatically generated suggestion is: Treant Trimming!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are! I turned Master Dickon's list over to Managingway, of course, so preparations are well underway.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: They did ask me to ask you to craft a few things though, if you don't mind.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Specifically─metal cutlery! Oh, how exciting.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Specifically─fancy table mats! Oh, how exciting.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Specifically─gentle dish soaps! Oh, how exciting.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I have the necessary supplies here, so you can set to work straightaway.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: As always, we've stocked the dreaming supporter with surplus supplies, so feel free to ask for more in case of unforeseen misfortune! If I had a carat for every time I've accidentally hopped too hard on one of our components...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Got a bit carried away with the materials, did you? Yes, I quite understand. The dreaming supporter can provide you with replacements.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Got a bit carried away with the materials, did you? Yes, I quite understand. The dreaming supporter can provide you with replacements.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Got a bit carried away with the materials, did you? Yes, I quite understand. The dreaming supporter can provide you with replacements.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER
dialogue.text: Thank you for your materials request! <blip> Oh dear! It appears that sufficient supplies are in your possession. Project management once again reminds you that all materials must be used before more are provided.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER
dialogue.text: Thank you for your materials request! <blip> Oh dear! It appears that sufficient supplies are in your possession. Project management once again reminds you that all materials must be used before more are provided.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER
dialogue.text: Thank you for your materials request! <blip> Oh dear! It appears that sufficient supplies are in your possession. Project management once again reminds you that all materials must be used before more are provided.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER
dialogue.text: Thank you for your materials request! <blip> Here you are─may your synthesis be finished well in time for supper!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER
dialogue.text: Thank you for your materials request! <blip> Here you are─may your synthesis be finished well in time for supper!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER
dialogue.text: Thank you for your materials request! <blip> Here you are─may your synthesis be finished well in time for supper!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Forename! I trust your work went to plan─Managingway's plan, that is.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, is that what those are supposed to look like? Fascinating...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Cookingway has already arranged his kitchen according to his very exacting preferences, so we should have everything we need to get started. I hope you worked up an appetite!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Feast your eyes on the cooking station! Mmm... What shall we eat first?

dialogue.name: COOKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Welcome! Do taste as many dishes as you like─each recipe has been prepared with loving care. If you have any questions about the flavors or techniques involved, I should be more than happy to instruct you.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I remember that Loporrit!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I should like to speak with them, but they're always running off...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The cooking station is now open, servicing the hungry Loporrits of Hoper's Hold and beyond. There is much yet to be done, however, if each is to find new purpose. Continue expanding the workshop to see what dreams may come!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have achieved Respected reputation with the Dreaming Ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You may raise their faith in you further by continuing to assist with the Dreaming Workshop.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: New Loporrit tribal daily quests are now available from Managingway in Hoper's Hold.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, you will be able to undertake three additional quests from Managingway as a reputation bonus. This bonus is available until the daily reset time for tribal quests.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: These additional quests will become available after accepting all current daily quests from Managingway. Please be advised that you cannot undertake these quests if you have no remaining allowances.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Coiningway.
